attributes.action: Michael gove to stop going against his word and ban slug pellets forever
attributes.additional_details: Michael gove set a mission to stop the use of slug pellets. He has now gone against his word!!!. Alot of animals eat slug pellets including pigeons which are in human food yes your right us humans are also getting parts of these in our bodies that the government don't want us to know about. Get behind this petition and take back control of our animals. After all these are gods creatures!!!!!!!
attributes.background: I'm a hedgehog rehabilitator and see alot of cases that involve hedgehog deaths due to slug pellets. A mother died from slug pellets and minuets later gave birth to her also dead hoglets. Not only hedgehogs eat these pellets but a big circle of animals do
